info.author: Julian Ciccale
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: Apache Software License
info.description: A Python Web Application Framework implementing a Pull HMVC model, with ZPT and XSLT out of the box. Easy to configure and install. And even more easy to extend. It workd with mod_python and the Apache server to deliver high performance requests.
info.name: pywork
info.html_description: A Python Web Application Framework implementing a Pull HMVC model, with ZPT and XSLT out of the box. Easy to configure and install. And even more easy to extend. It workd with mod_python and the Apache server to deliver high performance requests.
